Kashira:
Onna koyaku (女子役)

Category: Child

– Click image to view.

Plays:

Tametomo The Archer General (Chinsetsu yumi harizuki / 椿説弓張月)

The Bloodshed at Ise (Ise ondo koi no netaba / 伊勢音頭恋寝刃)

The Love Suicides at Amijima (Shinjū ten no Amijima / 心中天網島)

The Twins and the Sumida River (Futago Sumidagawa / 雙生隅田川)

The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil (Onnakoroshi abura no jigoku / 女殺油地獄)

The Courier for Hell (Meido no hikyaku / 冥途の飛脚)

A Tragic Love Triangle (Hadesugata onna maiginu / 艶容女舞衣)

Kagekiyo and His Daughter (Musume Kagekiyo Yashima nikki / 嬢景清八嶋日記)

The Shiraishi Story (Go taiheiki shiraishi banashi / 碁太平記白石噺)

The Two-Colored Reins (Koinyōbō somewake tazuna / 恋女房染分手綱)

The Murder in Revenge (Kunikotoba kudoki ondo / 国言詢音頭)

The Infant Pilgrim (Keisei Awa no naruto / 傾城阿波の鳴門)

Gonza the Lancer (Yari no Gonza kasane katabira / 鑓の権三重帷子)

The Story of the Morning Glory (Shōutsushi asagao banashi / 生写朝顔話)

The Romance in the Gay Quarters (Kuruwa bunshō / 曲輪ぶんしょう)

The Old Tale of Kusunoki (Kusunoki mukashibanashi / 楠昔噺)

Tragedy on a Snowy Night (Akegarasu yuki no akebono / 明烏六花曙)

The Inauspicious Sword (Sakuratsuba urami no samezaya / 桜鍔恨鮫鞘)

The Nine-Tailed Fox (Tamamo no mae asahi no tamoto / 玉藻前曦袂)

Oshun and Dembei (Chikagoro kawara no tatehiki / 近頃河原の達引)

The Battle of Ichinotani (Ichinotani futaba gunki / 一谷嫩軍記)

The Vendetta in Iga (Iga-goe dōchū sugoroku / 伊賀越道中双六)

The Story of Shunkin (Shunkin shō / 春琴抄)

The Disinherited Son (Meoto zenzai / 夫婦善哉)
